headerText: `v-overflow-btn` is used to give user the ability to select items from the list. It has 3 variations: `editable`, `overflow` and `segmented`

usage.desc: `v-overflow-btn` is used for creating selection lists

segmented.desc: `segmented` `v-overflow-btn` has additional divider between content and icon

editable.desc: `editable` `v-overflow-btn` can be directly edited, just as `v-text-field`

menuProps.desc: You can set underlying `v-menu` props using `menu-props` property

hint.desc: You can add a hint for user using `hint` property

counter.desc: You can add counter to `v-overflow-btn` to control max char count
